In Single Papa, a tiny new arrival brings big laughs, bigger chaos, and heart-melting moments. This heartfelt family dramedy follows the unexpected journey of parenthood, love, and the madness that comes with raising a little one in a house full of opinions.Streaming 12 December, only on Netflix, this one promises to be a perfect mix of warmth, comedy, and relatable family drama.
